channel.title: thoughts on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in thoughts on Long Thoughts

item.title: Life: A Game of Games
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Living in a complex world, everyday we’re moving from friend groups, to work, to chores, to dreams, to drama. Each and every area of life has such depths, that it seems like a world in itself. What can be gained, by looking at it through the metaphor of the game of games?

item.title: Our thoughts are not free
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Opposite to the traditional German folk song “Die Gedanken sind frei” (All thoughts are free) I claim otherwise. I will explain this in strictly logical terms, giving examples and scientific evidence, while the insight itself only came after long meditation.
